ROOT.GetDccCapacity: select dcc_id,capacity_hydro/10 from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNamesg_org_dcc_s_capacity where DCC_ID IN ('0021990100'/*,'0021990101','0021990102','0021990103','0021990104','0021990105','0021990106'*/) union all select a,sum(generator_capacity)/10 from ( SELECT substr(p.rel_id,0,2) as a,generator_capacity FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNamesg_rpt_gen_s_year s join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNamesg_con_pwrgrid_b p on s.id=p.id where generator_capacity > 0 and type=1002 and VOLTYPE IN (1001,1002,1003,1004,1005,1006,1007,1008,1009,1010,1011,1012,1013) and sta_year=2019 ) group by a
ROOT.GetDccCapacitySub: select a,sum(generator_capacity)/10 from ( SELECT substr(p.rel_id,0,4) as a,generator_capacity FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNamesg_rpt_gen_s_year s join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNamesg_con_pwrgrid_b p on s.id=p.id where p.rel_id like '{0}' and generator_capacity > 0 and type=1002 and VOLTYPE IN (1001,1002,1003,1004,1005,1006,1007,1008,1009,1010,1011,1012,1013) and sta_year=2019 ) group by a
ROOT.GetGridMaxPower: select dcc_id,capacity_hydro/10 + 200 from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNamesg_org_dcc_s_capacity where DCC_ID IN ('0021990100'/*,'0021990101','0021990102','0021990103','0021990104','0021990105','0021990106'*/) union all select a,1.1*sum(generator_capacity)/10 from ( SELECT substr(p.rel_id,0,2) as a,generator_capacity FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNamesg_rpt_gen_s_year s join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNamesg_con_pwrgrid_b p on s.id=p.id where generator_capacity > 0 and type=1002 and VOLTYPE IN (1001,1002,1003,1004,1005,1006,1007,1008,1009,1010,1011,1012,1013) and sta_year=2019 ) group by a
ROOT.GetDccCapacity2: SELECT P.DCC_ID,SUM(S.CAPACITY) FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNameSG_CON_PLANT_S S JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNameSG_CON_PLANT_B P ON S.ID=P.ID WHERE P.PLANT_TYPE=1002 AND P.OPERATE_STATE=1003 AND P.DCC_ID IN ('0021990100'/*,'0021990101','0021990102','0021990103','0021990104','0021990105','0021990106'*/) GROUP BY P.DCC_ID
ROOT.GetDccCapacity1: SELECT '0021990100',SUM(S.CAPACITY) FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNameSG_CON_PLANT_S S JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNameSG_CON_PLANT_B P ON S.ID=P.ID WHERE P.PLANT_TYPE=1002 AND P.OPERATE_STATE=1003 AND P.DCC_ID='0021990100' UNION ALL SELECT P.CONNECTIVE_PG_ID,SUM(S.CAPACITY) FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNameSG_CON_PLANT_S S JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNameSG_CON_PLANT_B P ON S.ID=P.ID WHERE P.PLANT_TYPE=1002 AND P.OPERATE_STATE=1003 AND P.CONNECTIVE_PG_ID IN ('0101990100','0101990101','0101990102','0101990103','0101990104','0101990105','0101990106') GROUP BY P.CONNECTIVE_PG_ID
ROOT.GetGridMaxPowerSub: SELECT ID,MAX_VALUE/10 FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNameSG_CON_PWRGRID_H_STA_POW_{0} WHERE DATASOURCE_ID='0021990100' AND CREATE_DATE=TO_DATE({1},'yyyy-MM-dd') AND MEAS_TYPE='13022001' AND ID IN ({2})
ROOT.GetGridMaxPower1: SELECT ID,MAX_VALUE FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNameSG_CON_PWRGRID_H_STA_POW_{0} WHERE DATASOURCE_ID='0021990100' AND CREATE_DATE=TO_DATE({1},'yyyy-MM-dd') AND MEAS_TYPE='13022001' AND ID IN ('0101990100','0101990101','0101990102','0101990103','0101990104','0101990105','0101990106')
ROOT.GetDccRunoffresv: select * from sg_con_plant_b_hydro h join SG_COM_RUNOFFRESV_B r on h.reservoir_id=r.id join sg_con_plant_b p on h.id=p.id where p.plant_type=1002 and p.dcc_id='0021990100'
ROOT.GetRunoffrecvCurve: SELECT DATE,MEAS_VALUE FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNamesg_com_runoffresv_h_flood_{1} WHERE ID={0} AND DATE>={2} AND DATE<{3} AND MEAS_TYPE={4} ORDER BY DATE
ROOT.GetDayLoadMaxCurve_Plant: SELECT create_date,MAX_VALUE/10 FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNamesg_con_plant_h_sta_pow_{1} WHERE ID={0} AND MEAS_TYPE='30022001' AND create_date>=TO_DATE({2},'yyyy-MM-dd') AND create_date<TO_DATE({3},'yyyy-MM-dd') AND DATASOURCE_ID='0021990100'
ROOT.GetDayLoadMaxCurve_Section: SELECT create_date,MAX_VALUE/10 FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNamesg_con_section_h_sta_pow_{1} WHERE ID={0} AND MEAS_TYPE='00002001' AND create_date>=TO_DATE({2},'yyyy-MM-dd') AND create_date<TO_DATE({3},'yyyy-MM-dd')
ROOT.GetDayPowerCurve_Plant: SELECT DATE,TMR_GEN_VALUE/10 FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNamesg_con_plant_h_sta_qua_{1} WHERE ID={0} AND date>=TO_DATE({2},'yyyy-MM-dd') AND date<TO_DATE({3},'yyyy-MM-dd') AND DATASOURCE_ID='0021990100'
ROOT.GetDayPowerCurve_Section: SELECT DATE,FORWARD_VALUE/10 FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNamesg_con_section_h_sta_qua_{1} WHERE ID={0} AND date>=TO_DATE({2},'yyyy-MM-dd') AND date<TO_DATE({3},'yyyy-MM-dd')
ROOT.GetGridCapacity: SELECT id,sum(generator_capacity)/10.0 FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNamesg_rpt_gen_s_year where type=1002 group by id
ROOT.GetGridCapacity1: SELECT P.CONNECTIVE_PG_ID,S.CAPACITY FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNameSG_CON_PLANT_S S JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNameSG_CON_PLANT_B P ON S.ID=P.ID WHERE P.PLANT_TYPE=1002 AND P.OPERATE_STATE=1003
ROOT.temp: 0021990100 国家电力调度控制中心 0021990101 华北电力调度控制分中心 0021990102 华东电力调度控制分中心 0021990103 华中电力调度控制分中心 0021990104 东北电力调度控制分中心 0021990105 西北电力调度控制分中心 0021990106 西南电力调度控制分中心
